original_text: Therefore that disciple whom Jesus loved saith unto Peter, It is the Lord. Now when Simon Peter heard that it was the Lord, he girt his fisher's coat unto him, (for he was naked,) and did cast himself into the sea.
korean_text: 예수께서 사랑하시는 그 제자가 베드로에게 이르되 주님이시라 하니 시몬 베드로가 벗고 있다가 주님이라 하는 말을 듣고 겉옷을 두른 후에 바다로 뛰어 내리더라

sentences.original_text: Therefore that disciple whom Jesus loved saith unto Peter
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 예수께서 사랑하시던 그 제자가 베드로에게 말하되

sentences.original_text: Now when Simon Peter heard that it was the Lord
he girt his fisher's coat unto him
and did cast himself into the sea
